title: Meliá Beachfront Vietnam Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Three-Course Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover seaside serenity at the five-star Meliá Ho Tram Beach Resort, delivering Mediterranean-style luxury on the pristine shores of Vietnam’s hottest beach destination. This sun-kissed coastal strip, home to the charming nearby town of Ho Tram, remains blissfully untouched and is blessed with spectacular white-sand beaches lapped by blue waters. Part of the prestigious Meliá Hotels & Resorts collection, this tropical resort sits amid 1,800 palm trees and is only a short drive from one of the top golf courses in Asia: the Greg Norman-designed The Bluffs Ho Tram Strip.

Relax beachfront at Breeza Beach Club, home to live music, swim-up bars and dance shows, making it the place to be in Ho Tram. Indulge in Asian street food and fresh, seasonal fare at two onsite restaurants, take a dip in one of the spectacular pools, or pamper your body and soul with treatments at YHI Spa. Plus, find plenty of time to explore the busy streets of Ho Chi Minh City using the resort's complimentary shuttle service.
offer_address: Coastal Road, Ho Tram Hamlet, Phuoc Thuan Commune, Xuyen Moc District, Vung Tau 790000, Vietnam

This vibrant tropical resort offers fun for the whole family, including a kids' club, basketball court and open-air cinema for the little ones, while adults can rejuvenate at the onsite spa and yoga deck.

Relax at Breeza Beach Club, home to live music performances and swim-up bars. At the end of each day, retire to your contemporary room, suite or villa for a great night's sleep.

title: Vietnam All-Inclusive Beachfront Paradise with Massages & Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Discover seaside serenity at this five-star, all-inclusive paradise, delivering Mediterranean-style luxury on the pristine shores of one of Vietnam’s most beautiful beach destinations. This sun-kissed coastal strip, home to the charming nearby town of Ho Tram, remains blissfully untouched and is blessed with spectacular white-sand beaches lapped by blue waters.

This vibrant tropical resort offers fun for the whole family, including a kids' club, basketball court and open-air cinema for the little ones, while adults can rejuvenate with a tension-melting treatment at YHI Spa and the yoga deck. At the heart of Meliá Ho Tram Beach Resort lies a sprawling pool, bordered by lush gardens and just steps from the beach.

Between tropical adventures, relax at Breeza Beach Club, home to live music performances and swim-up bars. Indulge in Asian street food and seasonal fare at both Muoi Restaurant and Sasa Restaurant, and refresh between dips with a smoothie or juice from Elyxr Café. At the end of each day, retire to your contemporary room, suite or villa for a great night's sleep.
offer_address: Coastal Road, Ho Tram Hamlet, Phuoc Thuan Commune, Xuyen Moc District, Vung Tau 790000, Vietnam

title: Grand Opening: Beachfront Ho Tram Sanctuary with Massages, Daily Dining & Nightly Drinks
description:
Peel the family away from vibrant Ho Chi Minh City and seek beachfront serenity at the brand-new Angsana Ho Tram, a beacon of tranquility just two hours from Vietnam's capital. Here, the drone of the city is put on mute and the lullabies of nature are set into overdrive. Discover the power of ginger, candlenut and frangipani during treatments at the world-class spa, and be one of the first to experience the hotel's signature Rainmist therapy. Even during meals, Ho Tram's scenery takes centre stage, whether you're dining on Mediterranean fare overlooking the beach at Azura, sipping cocktails in the ocean breeze at Zephyr or surrounded by tropical foliage at Nook.

Spend hours lapping the pool as the kids make a splash on the waterslide, before journeying into Ho Tram to uncover its many gems. Soak in the sprawling Binh Chau Hot Springs, trek 11,000 hectares of dewy rainforest in the Binh Chau-Phuoc Buu Nature Reserve or browse handmade goods at a local market - Ho Tram's offerings are boundless.
offer_address: Ven Bien Road, Ong To Hamlet, Xuyen Moc District, Phuoc Thuan Town Ba Rịa - Vung Tau Province 78507, Vietnam

title: Lush Coastal Vietnam Escape Overlooking the Beach with Four Onsite Restaurants
description: Adventure to a tranquil haven on one of Vietnam’s most serene stretches of coast with a hideaway at Dhawa Ho Tram Vietnam. Just two hours from Ho Chi Minh City, explore the natural beauty of the verdant forests and the sparkling magic of the beach. Steal views of the sunset from the comfort of Zephyr, the trendy bar slinging coast-front cocktails. When you’re not outside exploring, dine on delicious Mediterranean fare at Azura, or taste-test Vietnamese classics at Nook.
offer_address: Coastal Road, Ong To Hamlet, Phuoc Thuan Town, Xuyen Moc District, Ba Ria - Vung Tau Province, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Vietnam Beachside Retreat Just 2.5 Hours from Ho Chi Minh City with 16 Restaurants & World-Class Golf Course
description: Surrounded by the famed sand dunes of one of Asia’s most acclaimed golf courses and the shimmering turquoise waters of the South China Sea, InterContinental Grand Ho Tram, an IHG Hotel offers Las Vegas-style luxury in the heart of Vietnam’s premier entertainment complex. Dine your way across 16 top-notch venues, head to The Bluffs Grand Ho Tram Strip to practice your long game or simply laze the day way by the hotel’s dazzling lagoon-style pool before an afternoon dip in the ocean.
location_description: InterContinental Grand Ho Tram, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: The Grand Ho Tram Strip, Phuoc Thuan, Xuyen Moc, Ba Ria, Vung Tau, Vietnam, 790000

title: Idyllic Vietnam Beachfront Hideaway Overlooking Unspoilt Greenery
description: Venture out of Vietnam’s heaving capital and dive deep in the essence of coastal tranquillity at Angsana Ho Tram. Find your inner sense of serenity within verdant, untouched scenery that nudges up against a sparkling, and virtually secluded, coastline. Admire thriving gardens as you laze poolside or get to the heart of the area’s natural beauty with a stroll through waving trees to the magnificent beachfront. After days full of adventure, nourish your body with culinary delights at Nook, or watch the sunset as you enjoy mouthwatering dishes at Azura.
offer_address: Coastal Road, Ong To Hamlet, Phuoc Thuan Town, Ho Tram, Ba Rịa, Vung Tau Province, Vietnam
